data.text:
@SenCortezMasto Wrong, wrong, wrong.
People aren’t coming to Las Vegas because of corporate greed! It’s because there’s no buffets, no free parking, resort fees, ridiculous food and beverage prices, entertainment ticket prices and you need a 2nd mortgage if you touch a mini-bar.
@SenCortezMasto Are you lawfully elected?  100k fraudulent votes tabulated. Mostly going to Dems. Do you support non citizens voting in our elections? https://t.co/fCXggn2SPx

@SenCortezMasto You supported open borders, the biggest job killer in history.  Not to mention fraud with our money.  We’re voting you Democrats OUT… no matter how much money Soros gives you for adds!!!!!

@SenCortezMasto Since it's your state, did you ever think it might be your fault. I live here and can tell you housing being built here is exploding. Can't fill them, no water here and we still pay for gas coming from California which is high. Hope you lose your next election.
@SenCortezMasto Because of the dumb ass democrat lack of leadership. You are the problem
@SenCortezMasto A five second Google search will show you what is ruining Nevadas tourism.   This shit isn’t political.  It’s failed leadership.

@SenCortezMasto This going to help affordability for Reno?

https://t.co/9YhJHTXC24

@SenCortezMasto Still the 💵💰grab from our service workers.
Sad and frankly twisted hate by you directed at service workers.
FYI for liberals: Less tourists does not mean that individuals tip our service workers less…
So you should still pass no tax on tips.
Your TDS hurts our workers.
@RUSH_info @SenCortezMasto Unfortunately you’re correct. I’m 3rd generation Las Vegan..I’ve seen a lot

@SenCortezMasto Your rhetoric is destructive Cortes. Your open border policies have destroyed our nation and President. Trump and Best are simply trying to rebuild it. If you truly do work for citizens instead of criminals and illegals, then you would support all the great work they’re doing.🇺🇸
